name: Tuna Lettuce Wraps
author: spjeffer
summary: These are a low-calorie, low-carb, but very tasty, light alternative to a tuna wrap sandwich! Try to choose larger leaves of lettuce with no tears or holes; lettuce leaves are replacing the tortilla in a traditional wrap sandwich. Cheese is optional, but even a little adds a lot of flavor.
ingredients: 1 (6 ounce) can chunk light tuna, drained
salt and ground black pepper to taste
3 leaves green lettuce, rinsed and patted dry
2 tablespoons finely shredded low-fat Cheddar cheese  (Optional)
directions: Combine tuna, mayonnaise, onion, salt, and pepper in a bowl
Divide tuna mixture among the leaves, placing it in the middle of each leaf
Sprinkle Cheddar cheese over the tuna
Roll leaves up to create wraps
